text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translation.en.sahih: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
translation.id.indonesian: Kemudian mereka mendustakan Syu'aib, lalu mereka ditimpa azab pada hari mereka dinaungi awan. Sesungguhnya azab itu adalah azab hari yang besar.
